text: to vah log khud kahane lage paravaradigaar (qareeb ke saphar mein lutph nahin) to hamaare safaron mein dooree paida kar de aur un logon ne khud apane oopar zulm kiya to hamane bhee unako (tabaah karake unake) aphasaane bana die - aur unakee dhajjiyaan uda ke unako titir bitir kar diya beshak unamen har sabr va shukr karane vaalonke vaaste badee ibarate hain
